location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Andrew Price and Dymoke Lyster, East India Company Agent and Factor at Bussorah [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is notification of a chest aboard the Swallowcontaining 18,200 mamoodies [mahmudis] taken from Gombroon [Bandar Abbas] when the Company withdrew from there. Jervis is asked to exchange the money without heavy loss.
